DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect specific bone marrow map develop with18F-FLT PET/CT imaging ability spare proliferate bone marrow use proton beam radiotherapy compare IMRT . Participants 18 year age old history gynecologic cancer . Subjects undergo 3 FLT-PET scan ( one treatment , one course RT , one 2-5 week initiation RT ) . Scans take place Department Radiation Oncology .
DOC.brief_title: 18F Flourothymidine ( FLT ) PET/CT Imaging Gynecologic Cancers
DOC.criteria: Participants 18 year age old History gynecologic cancer . Recommended undergo IMRT PBT pelvis concurrent chemotherapy Female participant childbearing potential must negative urine serum pregnancy test time screen visit . Participants must inform investigational nature study provide write informed consent accordance institutional federal guideline prior study specific procedure . Participants must willing able comply schedule visit image procedure opinion investigator treat physician . Exclusion Criteria Females pregnant breast feeding time screen eligible study . Inability tolerate image procedure opinion investigator treat physician Serious unstable medical psychological condition , opinion investigator would compromise subject safety successful participation study . Unwilling unable provide inform consent
